REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Abandoned child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born sickly. Thinking that HE would only burden the tribe, HIS parents left HIM out in the elements. Somehow, HE survived.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cave child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in a large and intricate cave complex that extended deep into a mountainside. HECAP helped the adults maintain and improve the deep caves.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fire tender
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In HIS childhood, NAME was responsible for keeping the tribe's fire going. HECAP took this responsibility very seriously.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Herder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, NAME tended the tribe's muffalo herds, keeping them safe from predators and treating the sick. It was quiet work, but HE enjoyed being away from people.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Reclusive child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME didn't learn to speak until HE was nearly 5 years old, and, even then, HE preferred to keep to HIMself. When HE was in HIS early teens, HE made a habit of wandering off from the village to live in the wilderness for weeks at a time.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Scavenger
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME spent HIS childhood escaping grunt work to go digging through wrecks and ruins for treasures. HISCAP natural curiosity got HIM into a lot of trouble, but it also yielded many interesting finds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sole survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's entire tribe was wiped out in a raid. Though HE was adopted by another group, HE was emotionally scarred, and preferred to stay near home, cooking and tending crops.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tribe child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in the tribe, running around the village, moving with the muffalo herds, learning essential skills from HIS parents. HECAP never learned to read and never saw a machine that wasn't an ancient ruin.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vengeful child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, NAME returned to HIS village to find that it had been wiped out by bandits. HECAP swore revenge on the attackers and began a violent rampage across the wilderness.
